snippet.title: Remote Planets - Trailer 1
snippet.description:
Remote Planets is a puzzle game taking you on a journey through a vibrant, colorful alien world filled with unique logic challenges. As you solve sets of levels and discover unique mechanics, you will meet many friendly characters out of this world, guiding you along the path.

Coming out on Steam in May 2023!

Wishlist it and play the demo here: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2197020/Remote_Planets/
